$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor autocomplete

showFileTree.description: Show files as tree (false for flat list)

layout.description: Diff layout mode: auto switches based on autoSwitchWidth, unified/split are fixed

autoSwitchWidth.description: Auto-switch to split view above this terminal width (only used when layout is auto)

wrap.description: Wrap long lines in diff view

useJjFormatter.description: Use jj's ui.diff-formatter output in the diff view

whatsNewDisabled.description: Disable the what's new screen on updates
